page.title: 06HOUSING
page.content: {Home Industries Mr and Mrs Edwards own{Croft House. They sell fruit and vegetables. They grow most of their own fruit but they buy in peaches, grapes and tropical fruit. They also sell paving slabs, logs and bedding plants. They sell to the village shop and Packwood Haugh school. First they just grew potatoes, they had too many so they sold them and the buisness just grew. {Clifton House Clifton House is a smallholding covering 10 acres of land.With one acre being used for soft fruit farming, strawberries, blackcurrants gooseberries and raspberries. 4 acres is used for hay for winter feed for the 40 ewes and lambs. Accomodation is also offered and can provide for 6 people for bed & breakfast & evening meal.{
